MemoryInfobox.description: 'Paros Island|Paros blockaded the Naxos harbor in preparation for an assault. Myrrine feared the Naxos Island|Naxos fleet couldn't take Paros alone, but Kassandra knew her own crew was up to the task.'

General_Description: '''The Paros Blockade''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: In an attempt to force [[Naxos Island]] into submission, [[Paros Island]]'s ships blockaded the [[Naxos]] harbor. [[Myrrine]], nor her daughter [[Kassandra]], would allow them to succeed.
Section_Dialogue:
With her tasks completed, Kassandra returned to Myrrine at her [[Naxos villa|villa]], but [[Hektor]] entered with urgent news. *'''Myrrine:''' ''You may speak.'' *'''Hektor:''' ''Ships from [[Paros]] have blockaded the harbor.'' *'''Myrrine:''' ''Gods curse [[Silanos]] and his damned [[Cult of Kosmos|Cult]]. Do they never tire of meddling?'' Frustrated, she and [[Aspasia]] walked to the balcony to look out at the blockade. *'''Myrrine:''' ''Tell them I'm on my way.'' Hektor left as Kassandra joined them. *'''Kassandra:''' ''A blockade?'' *'''Myrrine:''' ''I've refused to pay tribute to [[Athens]], and Paros is taking advantage of the situation.'' *'''Myrrine:''' ''There goes our hope of striking first.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I can bring my [[Adrestia|ship]] around and clear the harbor.'' *'''Myrrine:''' ''Just you against an entire blockade?'' |-|It will be easy.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''You're right. It's terrible odds for Paros.'' |-|We have no choice.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I don't see another option. But I have the best crew on the [[Aegean Sea|Aegean]].'' *'''Myrrine:''' ''Be safe... and come back to me, lamb.'' [[File:ACOD_The_Paros_Blockade_-_Kassandra_Report_Mission.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra reporting her success]] Kassandra took the ''Adrestia'' out to sea to meet the blockade. She sank all of the ships and returned to Myrrine at the port. *'''Kassandra:''' ''The harbor is clear. We need to move out before they send reinforcements.'' *'''Myrrine:''' ''We're almost ready. [[Timo]]?'' *'''Timo:''' ''The ships are loading now. They'll be ready on your command.'' *'''Myrrine:''' ''Kassandra. A word.'' (If players asked "What's wrong?") *'''Kassandra:''' ''Is something wrong?'' *'''Myrrine:''' ''Besides the attacks on my island and the Cult's meddling? No. But we must speak privately.'' (If players chose "Of course.") *'''Kassandra:''' ''Whatever you need.'' [[File:ACOD_The_Paros_Blockade_-_Myrrine_Discussing_With_Kassandra.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra Myrrine discussing the Cult]] The two walked away from the dock. *'''Myrrine:''' ''The Cult must be stopped. When we return to [[Lakonia]], it will be dangerous.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm used to it.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''We both are.'' *'''Myrrine:''' ''Here, I know who I can and cannot trust. I would have said that about [[Sparta]], too. But this news about the [[Two Kings of Sparta|King]]...'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Did Aspasia find out ''which'' of the kings is working with the Cult?'' *'''Myrrine:''' ''For all we know, it's both. We must cleanse [[Sparta]] of its corruption no matter the cost.'' |-|I stand with you.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''At least now we can face them together.'' *'''Myrrine:''' ''Yes. For all that those bastards tried to take from us. And your [[Alexios|brother]]...
We will find him.'' |-|We should focus on Paros.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Once Paros is dealt with, we will get to work.'' *'''Myrrine:''' ''You're right.'' *'''Myrrine:''' ''Come see me when you're ready.'' They returned to Timo. Myrrine turned to Kassandra. *'''Myrrine:''' ''Are you ready to sail?'' (If players asked "Where are we sailing?") *'''Kassandra:''' ''Where to?'' *'''Myrrine:''' ''We're going to destroy the fleet of Paros once and for all. Only then will Naxos be secure enough for us to leave.'' (Accept – "I'm ready.") *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm ready.'' [[File:ACOD_The_Paros_Blockade_-_Myrrine_Timo_Closeup.png|thumb|250px|Timo and Myrrine]] Myrrine turned to Timo. *'''Myrrine:''' ''Then I leave this to you.'' The two clasped each other's arms. *'''Timo:''' ''With your shield, or on it.'' *'''Myrrine:''' ''And now we strike a blow to the Cult.''
Section_Outcome: Kassanda single-handedly smashed Paros's naval blockade, allowing Naxos to rally for a final assault on their fleet.
Section_Trivia: *Timo's comment "With your shield, or on it" is a variant of a Spartan saying recorded by [[Plutarch]] in his ''{{Wiki|Moralia}}''. It may also be considered reference to the movie ''{{Wiki|300 (film)|300}}'', as Timo's words are verbatim.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''

[[fr:Le blocus de Paros]]

Structured_Dialogue.content: With her tasks completed, Kassandra returned to Myrrine at her [[Naxos villa|villa]], but [[Hektor]] entered with urgent news.
*'''Myrrine:''' ''Gods curse [[Silanos]] and his damned [[Cult of Kosmos|Cult]]. Do they never tire of meddling?''
Frustrated, she and [[Aspasia]] walked to the balcony to look out at the blockade.
Hektor left as Kassandra joined them.
*'''Myrrine:''' ''I've refused to pay tribute to [[Athens]], and Paros is taking advantage of the situation.''
*'''Myrrine:''' ''There goes our hope of striking first.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I can bring my [[Adrestia|ship]] around and clear the harbor.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You're right. It's terrible odds for Paros.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I don't see another option. But I have the best crew on the [[Aegean Sea|Aegean]].''
*'''Myrrine:''' ''Be safe... and come back to me, lamb.''
Kassandra took the ''Adrestia'' out to sea to meet the blockade. She sank all of the ships and returned to Myrrine at the port.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The harbor is clear. We need to move out before they send reinforcements.''
*'''Timo:''' ''The ships are loading now. They'll be ready on your command.''
*'''Myrrine:''' ''Besides the attacks on my island and the Cult's meddling? No. But we must speak privately.''
The two walked away from the dock.
*'''Myrrine:''' ''The Cult must be stopped. When we return to [[Lakonia]], it will be dangerous.''
*'''Myrrine:''' ''Here, I know who I can and cannot trust. I would have said that about [[Sparta]], too. But this news about the [[Two Kings of Sparta|King]]...''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Did Aspasia find out ''which'' of the kings is working with the Cult?''
*'''Myrrine:''' ''For all we know, it's both. We must cleanse [[Sparta]] of its corruption no matter the cost.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''At least now we can face them together.''

*'''Myrrine:''' ''Yes. For all that those bastards tried to take from us. And your [[Alexios|brother]]...
We will find him.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Once Paros is dealt with, we will get to work.''
They returned to Timo. Myrrine turned to Kassandra.
*'''Myrrine:''' ''We're going to destroy the fleet of Paros once and for all. Only then will Naxos be secure enough for us to leave.''
The two clasped each other's arms.
*'''Myrrine:''' ''And now we strike a blow to the Cult.''
